description: Creates a new generic web worker definition in the given or default project.
title: Angular Web Worker Options Schema

___name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use for the worker?

___target.description: The target to apply web worker to.

___snippet.description: Add a worker creation snippet in a sibling file of the same name.

___path.description: The path at which to create the worker file, relative to the current workspace.
